kind.description: The kind of a user. Either a regular user or a bot.

location.description: A user's location. It's not formatted nor checked as an existing place, so it could be anything.

get.description: Returns the list of all users.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The pagination page. For example, if you paginate 1 to 42 per 10 and ask for the third page, you will get 31 to 40.

schema.description: A pagination page number.

parameters.name: per
parameters.description: The number of paginated items per page. For example, if you paginate 1 to 42 per 10 and ask for the third page, you will get 31 to 40.

schema.description: The number of paginated items per page.
A paginated array of users.

items.description: An array of users (without unnecessary details).

per.description: The number of paginated items per page.

total.description: The total count of elements in a paginated result. It represents the total in all pages, and **does not** depend on the number of items per page.

get.description: Lists all published places by default. If a `state` query parameter is set, this endpoint will list all places in the specified state.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The pagination page. For example, if you paginate 1 to 42 per 10 and ask for the third page, you will get 31 to 40.

schema.description: A pagination page number.

parameters.name: per

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: A state to filter places. Default is 'published'.
